overview:
## Discussion

The Apple Watch’s heart rate sensor generates and analyzes ECG data similar to a Lead I ECG.

# HKElectrocardiogram.Lead.appleWatchSimilarToLeadI

**Case**

Apple Watch Series 4 or later.

## Declaration

```swift
case appleWatchSimilarToLeadI
```

## Discussion

The Apple Watch’s heart rate sensor generates and analyzes ECG data similar to a Lead I ECG.
title: HKElectrocardiogram.Lead.appleWatchSimilarToLeadI
